@amberdegrace I just added close to boil end. The hope was for nutty/earthy/savoury. Will add more in next batch!

@MelissaCole There's just under a keg, but if you know anyone going from Welly to London in next few weeks, can fill a bottle from tap?!
@MelissaCole Calling all beer mules!!!
@MelissaCole Did tasting notes today... It's 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼! Think mānuka-smoked bananas, fruity esters, some candied lemon zest & v.smooth for 9%!
@MelissaCole Never! That is Bret Michaels exclaiming the brew's greatness in an Unskinny Bop-like manner! #bopbopbop

The @metlinkwgtn @GoWellingtonBus driver on the 22 Southgate bus (4259) is awesome. Super cheerful, enjoying his job, makes me smile! 🙌🚌
@MrDColbert Either that, or a poor crack at mill... Those kernels are quite slender.
@Kekeke19ke @ForkandBrewer Haha, I'll try! #brokenphone
@MrDColbert Interesting. I got terrible conversion. Long mash was my attempt to get full saccharification!
@MrDColbert Also reported that flavour here... https://t.co/K8lUxk1vq2
@MrDColbert Two hour rest at 65C. First runnings still positive for starch, but gone after 10 mins. 60 minute runoff.
@MrDColbert Interesting... Yeah, this one is amazingly clean and light, even though it finished at 1.011. Incredible berry flavour from oats
@The_Bottleneck @ForkandBrewer Strangely light, considering! But at 3%, to be expected... #workinprogress
